houses_intro.1: The First House (Tanur Bhava) represents the physical body, appearance, character, and general health.
houses_intro.2: The Second House (Dhana Bhava) represents wealth, speech, family lineage, and accumulated assets.
houses_intro.3: The Third House (Sahaja Bhava) represents courage, younger siblings, communication, and self-effort.
houses_intro.4: The Fourth House (Matru Bhava) represents mother, domestic happiness, property, vehicles, and peace of mind.
houses_intro.5: The Fifth House (Putra Bhava) represents children, intelligence, creativity, romance, and past-life karma (Purva Punya).
houses_intro.6: The Sixth House (Ari Bhava) represents enemies, diseases, debts, litigation, and service.
houses_intro.7: The Seventh House (Kalatra Bhava) represents spouse, business partnerships, and public image.
houses_intro.8: The Eighth House (Ayur Bhava) represents longevity, sudden events, inheritance, occult science, and transformation.
houses_intro.9: The Ninth House (Dharma Bhava) represents luck, religion, father, higher learning, and long-distance travel.
houses_intro.10: The Tenth House (Karma Bhava) represents career, social status, fame, and authority.
houses_intro.11: The Eleventh House (Labha Bhava) represents gains, influential friends, desires, and networking.
houses_intro.12: The Twelfth House (Vyaya Bhava) represents losses, expenditures, foreign lands, isolation, and spiritual liberation.

planet_nature.Sun: The Sun is the Soul (Atmakaraka). It signifies authority, father, government, and willpower.
planet_nature.Moon: The Moon signifies the Mind (Manas). It rules emotions, mother, nurturing, and public interaction.
planet_nature.Mars: Mars is the Commander. It signifies energy, courage, aggression, land, and brothers.
planet_nature.Mercury: Mercury is the Prince. It signifies intellect, speech, commerce, logic, and friends.
planet_nature.Jupiter: Jupiter is the Guru. It signifies wisdom, expansion, wealth, religion, and progeny.
planet_nature.Venus: Venus is the Minister. It signifies love, beauty, luxury, marriage, and artistic talent.
planet_nature.Saturn: Saturn is the Servant. It signifies discipline, delay, sorrow, hard work, and longevity.
planet_nature.Rahu: Rahu is the Outcast. It signifies obsession, innovation, foreign things, and material illusion.
planet_nature.Ketu: Ketu is the Ascetic. It signifies detachment, spirituality, moksha, and confusion.

interpretations.Sun_1: Sun in the 1st House: You have a strong personality and natural authority. You are ambitious and confident. Health is generally good, but you may suffer from heat-related issues or ego conflicts.
interpretations.Sun_2: Sun in the 2nd House: You may speak with authority but can be harsh. You will earn wealth through government or high positions. Dental or eye troubles are possible.
interpretations.Sun_3: Sun in the 3rd House: You are courageous and adventurous. You may have differences with siblings. Success comes through self-effort.
interpretations.Sun_4: Sun in the 4th House: Career success is favored, but domestic peace may be disturbed. Relations with mother may be strained.
interpretations.Sun_5: Sun in the 5th House: You are intelligent and creative. Few children are indicated. You may have an interest in stock markets or speculation.
interpretations.Sun_6: Sun in the 6th House: This is a powerful position. You will crush enemies and succeed in competitions. Health will be robust.
interpretations.Sun_7: Sun in the 7th House: Late marriage or ego clashes in partnership are likely. You have a public presence but need to compromise more in relationships.
interpretations.Sun_8: Sun in the 8th House: Longevity is good, but eyesight may be weak. Interest in occult subjects. Sudden gains through inheritance are possible.
interpretations.Sun_9: Sun in the 9th House: You are religious and fortunate. Relations with father are significant. Long travels bring success.
interpretations.Sun_10: Sun in the 10th House: Excellent for career. You will hold positions of power and authority. Fame and status are guaranteed.
interpretations.Sun_11: Sun in the 11th House: You will have influential friends and steady gains. Social circle will include people of high status.
interpretations.Sun_12: Sun in the 12th House: You may live in foreign lands. Eyesight needs care. Spiritual inclination is strong.
interpretations.Moon_1: Moon in the 1st House: You are emotional, sensitive, and moody. You have a pleasant appearance. You are fond of travel.
interpretations.Moon_2: Moon in the 2nd House: You have a sweet face and speech. Financial fluctuations are common. You are close to your family.
interpretations.Moon_3: Moon in the 3rd House: You are fond of siblings and short travels. You have artistic talents and good communication skills.
interpretations.Moon_4: Moon in the 4th House: You are attached to your mother and home. You will own vehicles and property. Emotional peace is vital.
interpretations.Moon_5: Moon in the 5th House: You are romantic and creative. You love children. Speculation brings mixed results.
interpretations.Moon_6: Moon in the 6th House: Health may be delicate during childhood. You serve others well but may have hidden enemies.
interpretations.Moon_7: Moon in the 7th House: You desire a beautiful and emotional partner. Marriage brings travel and gains. Public success is indicated.
interpretations.Moon_8: Moon in the 8th House: Longevity is good. Interest in mysteries. Emotional ups and downs are frequent.
interpretations.Moon_9: Moon in the 9th House: You are fortunate and charitable. Foreign travel is indicated. You are spiritually inclined.
interpretations.Moon_10: Moon in the 10th House: Career involves public interaction. Changes in profession are possible. Success in fields related to liquids or travel.
interpretations.Moon_11: Moon in the 11th House: You have many friends, especially females. Wealth comes easily. Desires are fulfilled.
interpretations.Moon_12: Moon in the 12th House: You prefer solitude. Expenses are high. Spiritual experiences or foreign residence is likely.
interpretations.Mars_1: Mars in the 1st House: You are energetic, impulsive, and brave. A scar on head or face is possible. Manglik Dosha may exist.
interpretations.Mars_7: Mars in the 7th House: Manglik Dosha is present. Partnership requires patience. You are passionate but argumentative.
interpretations.Jupiter_1: Jupiter in the 1st House: You are wise, noble, and healthy. God's grace is upon you. You will be respected in society.
interpretations.Jupiter_6: Jupiter in the 6th House: You will overcome enemies through wisdom. Health issues related to liver or sugar may arise. Service to others brings joy.
interpretations.Saturn_1: Saturn in the 1st House: You are disciplined and serious. Success comes slowly but surely. You are hardworking.
interpretations.Saturn_10: Saturn in the 10th House: Excellent for leadership. You rise to power through hard work. Career is stable.
interpretations.General: The planet {planet} in House {house} gives mixed results. It influences {sign} characteristics significantly.

dashas.Sun: Sun Mahadasha (6 Years): A period of authority, fame, and government favor. Good for career advancement. Issues with heat or ego may arise.
dashas.Moon: Moon Mahadasha (10 Years): A period of emotional growth, motherly happiness, and travel. Changes in residence are likely.
dashas.Mars: Mars Mahadasha (7 Years): A period of high energy, technical success, and property acquisition. Watch your temper.
dashas.Rahu: Rahu Mahadasha (18 Years): A period of sudden events, innovation, and foreign travel. Can bring confusion or massive material success.
dashas.Jupiter: Jupiter Mahadasha (16 Years): The Golden Period. Wisdom, wealth, children, and general prosperity increase.
dashas.Saturn: Saturn Mahadasha (19 Years): A period of hard work, discipline, and building long-term foundations. Can be stressful but rewarding.
dashas.Mercury: Mercury Mahadasha (17 Years): A period of learning, business, and communication. Intellect is sharp.
dashas.Ketu: Ketu Mahadasha (7 Years): A period of detachment and spirituality. Good for occult studies, bad for material attachments.
dashas.Venus: Venus Mahadasha (20 Years): A period of luxury, romance, arts, and comfort. Marriage and vehicles are acquired.

transits.Saturn: Transit Saturn (Sade Sati/Kantaka): A defining time. Hard work is required. Results are delayed but solid.
transits.Jupiter: Transit Jupiter: Brings protection and opportunities. Good for learning and expansion.
transits.Rahu: Transit Rahu: Brings sudden changes and new desires. Be careful of illusions.
transits.Ketu: Transit Ketu: Brings detachment and sudden breaks. Good for spiritual practice.
